title: Unknown error
body: Since the last patch, the legacy client keeps throwing me an unknown error. It always happens when logging, without fail, then about 3-4 of them spammed after every game. it doesn't appear to be really affecting anything but it's annoying.

replies.body:
Did you ever recently or in the past, make any changes to your language or locale settings? We've seen this happen often after changes are manually made to your language for League.

Please let me know!
